officer

  • Function reference

slide layout properties

get informations about a particular slide layout into a data.frame.

layout_properties(x, layout = NULL, master = NULL)

Arguments

x
pptx object
layout
slide layout name to use
master
master layout name where layout is located

Examples

x <- read_pptx()
layout_properties ( x = x, layout = "Title Slide", master = "Office Theme" )
#> # A tibble: 5 × 7
#>    master_name        name     type         offx         offy           cx
#>          <chr>       <chr>    <chr>        <dbl>        <dbl>        <dbl>
#> 1 Office Theme Title Slide       dt 5.000000e-01 6.951389e+00 2.333333e+00
#> 2 Office Theme Title Slide      ftr 3.416667e+00 6.951389e+00 3.166667e+00
#> 3 Office Theme Title Slide   sldNum 7.166667e+00 6.951389e+00 2.333333e+00
#> 4 Office Theme Title Slide subTitle 1.371600e+06 3.886200e+06 6.400800e+06
#> 5 Office Theme Title Slide ctrTitle 6.858000e+05 2.130425e+06 7.772400e+06
#> # ... with 1 more variables: cy <dbl>
layout_properties ( x = x, master = "Office Theme" )
#> # A tibble: 58 × 7
#>     master_name                    name   type     offx      offy       cx
#>           <chr>                   <chr>  <chr>    <dbl>     <dbl>    <dbl>
#> 1  Office Theme             Title Slide     dt 0.500000 6.9513889 2.333333
#> 2  Office Theme             Title Slide    ftr 3.416667 6.9513889 3.166667
#> 3  Office Theme             Title Slide sldNum 7.166667 6.9513889 2.333333
#> 4  Office Theme Title and Vertical Text  title 0.500000 0.3003478 9.000000
#> 5  Office Theme Title and Vertical Text   body 0.500000 1.7500000 9.000000
#> 6  Office Theme Title and Vertical Text     dt 0.500000 6.9513889 2.333333
#> 7  Office Theme Title and Vertical Text    ftr 3.416667 6.9513889 3.166667
#> 8  Office Theme Title and Vertical Text sldNum 7.166667 6.9513889 2.333333
#> 9  Office Theme Vertical Title and Text  title 7.250000 0.3003478 2.250000
#> 10 Office Theme Vertical Title and Text   body 0.500000 0.3003478 6.583333
#> # ... with 48 more rows, and 1 more variables: cy <dbl>
layout_properties ( x = x, layout = "Two Content" )
#> # A tibble: 6 × 7

#> 6 Office Theme Two Content sldNum 7.166667 6.9513889 2.333333 0.3993056
